title: #319: Witches, Bigfoot And Dogman with Ryan Singer
description:
Thank yo so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli and happy Memorial Day. This episode I welcome back G Paranormal Expert Ryan Singer to discuss the Occult and to hear his insane Bigfoot and Dogman story! His story is nuts! Thank you so much for your support! Enjoy your Memorial Day!

I will be live at The Comedy Club in Kanas City June 4th-6th!
https://www.thecomedyclubkc.com/events/39593

please check out Ryan Singer's internet:
